title: So yeah, Riven is pretty stupid now with new Black Cleaver
body:
She was kinda already borderline but I didn't mind her much because almost any bruiser could beat her so long as they didn't die to her early cheese or level 6 cheese. Outside of that, she was still incredibly squishy until she got a boat load of CDR and AD for her shield to be spammable and huge with its scaling. So any armor stacking bruiser would just maul her by level 7 or so. 

That's not really the case anymore. I really didn't think it'd be that great on her because of how she preferred the early pen from brut but it's r%%%%%ed. It's not hard for her to farm the gold for it and once she completes it, she stacks the shread so fast and she's got 20% CDR on top of that with a boatload of health. It's honestly fucking r%%%%%ed. Thank God most Riven players are terrible but they should probably nerf her instead of the item just because of her existence. That is all.
